title: Text Mining-Based Analytical Practice for Financial Fraud Prediction

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning utilizing real corporate financial statement datasets

learning_goals: Extract meaningful thematic elements from financial documents using LDA (Latent Dirichlet Allocation) and STM (Structural Topic Modeling) techniques
Perform topic modeling on corporate financial statements and map derived thematic elements to financial fraud risk indicators
Build predictive models combining corporate financial statement data with financial metrics (leverage, tangible asset ratio, etc.) using Python-based text analysis tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
